  • Check if the surroundings of the location suit your business.

Footfall & Vehicle Traffic

Number of people walking and driving by the location

Knowing the footfall and vehicle traffic is the key to estimating the number of people who could potentially be exposed to the brand and making revenue predictions
  • How many people walk by the potential location?
  • How many cars drive by it?
  • What is the distribution of traffic throughout the workday? Weekend? Week? Month?

Demographic Analysis

Age, gender, relationship status, household income, and more

Demographic data will help you make sure that there is a sufficient pool of potential customers around the target location. We bridge multiple sources of data and collate it all in one place enhancing the power of Location Intelligence
  • Who are the people living and working around that location?
  • Do they fit my target audience?
  • How many people are there within a 100 yards radius? 500? 1000?

Amenities Analysis

Accessibility of the location and points of interest

Comprehending the amenities around your chosen location becomes pivotal in discerning the demographic that will frequent these establishments, guided by location analytics.
  • How accessible is the location?
  • What kind of supermarkets and groceries stores are nearby?
  • Are there any educational facilities nearby, such as nurseries, schools, or universities?

Competitor Analysis

Who are the competitors around and how they are performing

Competitive analysis will help paint a clear picture of the surroundings, understand what makes this location tick and identify hidden opportunities
  • What competition will I have to face?
  • What do their customers think about them?
  • Are the big brands there?
  • Are there enough competitors around to drive people to that location?

Frequently Asked Questions

Find answers to questions about location reports

What are location insights? What data is inside each location report?

Location insights provide analysis of geographical areas tailored to your needs. Reports include information about Footfall & Vehicle Traffic, Demographic Analysis, Amenities Analysis, Competitor Analysis. When you purchase the location report, you receive a well-structured document containing relevant insights specific to the geographical area.

Who benefits from utilizing Location Intelligence data from the location reports?

Business owners, executives, marketers, and strategists benefit from insights into geographical areas. Whether you're planning expansion, optimizing store locations, or understanding local market dynamics, the location report provides actionable insights for strategies.

When does one need location insights? When should location reports be used?

Location insights are crucial for expanding or optimizing a business's presence. Reports inform decisions about new locations, understanding local consumer behavior, and identifying growth opportunities.

Can I share the purchased location reports with colleagues and stakeholders?

Certainly. The report is a valuable resource for your team. Send a link to the report to your colleagues, stakeholders, and decision-makers to ensure informed strategies.

Will the data in the location report be updated after purchase?

The report is a web page that gets updated in real-time with new data that we are adding regularly. Stay tuned to our updates to help navigate changes in the geographical landscape.

To whom have you provided location insights in the past?

We collaborate with clients across industries. Our expertise spans new ventures to established enterprises, assisting businesses in various sectors by providing actionable insights.
